trans-unit.source: Defines the behavior for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> associated with a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" />.
trans-unit.target: Define o comportamento para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> associado com um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" />.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior> to access the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object in your workflow service.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior> para acessar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> objeto em seu serviço de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object is added by default when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> is created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> objeto é adicionado por padrão quando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> é criado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A> property to 10 minutes.
trans-unit.target: Esse construtor define o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A> propriedade para 10 minutos.

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Não implementado.

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Não implementado.

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Não implementado.

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Não implementado.

trans-unit.source: Not implemented in <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior" />.
trans-unit.target: Não implementado no <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior" />.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do serviço.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: O host de serviço.

trans-unit.source: Configures the workflow service to support the workflow run-time behavior.
trans-unit.target: Configura o serviço de fluxo de trabalho para dar suporte ao comportamento de tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A> extension and configures it for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método cria um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A> extensão e o configura para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates how long a workflow instance stays in-memory in the idle state before it is forcibly removed from memory.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica por quanto tempo uma instância de fluxo de trabalho permanece na memória no estado ocioso antes de ser removida de modo forçado da memória.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object indicating how long a workflow instance stays in-memory in the idle state before it is forcibly removed from memory.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> objeto indicando como tempo uma fluxo de trabalho instância permanece na memória no estado ocioso antes que ele forçará é removido da memória.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do serviço.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: O host de serviço.

trans-unit.source: Verifies the scheduling service used for workflow services has been added to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> object and that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> object has not started before the call to <see cref="Overload:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.Open" />.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o serviço de agendamento usado para serviços de fluxo de trabalho foi adicionado no objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> e se o objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> não foi iniciado antes da chamada de <see cref="Overload:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.Open" />.

trans-unit.source: The wrong <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService" /> is registered.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService" /> errado está registrado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> associated with a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a instância de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> associada a um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object is not initialized before retrieving this property, then a new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object is created.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> não é possível inicializar o objeto antes de recuperar essa propriedade, em seguida, um novo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> objeto é criado.
